Articles.Content: So before I got version 1.5, I never got any lag unless I built some sort of ridiculous contraption. But ever since I'd gotten it, I'd always been met with lag and stutters, no matter if the save is empty or loaded with craft. The lag isn't extremely bad, but it is noticeable, and it bugs me. I'm thinking it could be caused by the new kerbal suits, but I'm not sure. What is causing my game to constantly lag all of a sudden? Thanks!

On 10/29/2018 at 3:59 AM, proteusthe said:

So before I got version 1.5, I never got any lag unless I built some sort of ridiculous contraption. But ever since I'd gotten it, I'd always been met with lag and stutters, no matter if the save is empty or loaded with craft. The lag isn't extremely bad, but it is noticeable, and it bugs me. I'm thinking it could be caused by the new kerbal suits, but I'm not sure. What is causing my game to constantly lag all of a sudden? Thanks!

Do you mind to check the ram usage of your computer?

Wow I'm dumb, I just had to end some background processes, and the lag and stutter is gone. Either that or it was just random.

Edited November 5, 2018 by proteusthe
